remark.ch: A班：限學號後二碼除以3餘數1者等同學選修

goal.en: The introductory course of geotechnical engineering allows students to understand the similarities and differences between the soil and the mechanics of other civil materials
goal.ch: 大地工程領域的入門課程，讓學生了解土壤跟其他土木材料力學性質的異同。介紹土壤的組成及分類方法，結合流體力學的觀念說明土壤中水的流動及對基礎設計及施工的影響，土壤的夯實理論及施工方法，地中應力及土壤有效應力的觀念以結合材料力學及流體力學的知識來學習並掌握土壤的工程及力學特性，如何經由試驗方求得基礎設計及施工所需的設計參數。及土壤的壓縮性質及土壤剪力強度的理論及試驗方法。

content.en:
"1. Soil and rock
2. Basic properties of Soil
3. Types of Soils
4. Compactness of Soil
5. Effective stresses
6. Compressibility of Soil
7. Shear stress"
content.ch:
1.土壤與岩石﹐
2.重量與體積關係、塑性及土壤結構﹐
3.土壤分類﹐
4.土壤夯實﹐
5.土中水之流動：滲透與滲流﹐
6.有效應力觀念
7.土中應力﹐
8.土壤之壓縮性﹐
9.土壤之剪力強度

textbook.en: "Principle of Geotechnical Engineering, 9th ed., by B.J. Das and K. Sobhan"
textbook.ch: "Principle of Geotechnical Engineering, 9th ed., by B.J. Das and K. Sobhan"

flex_desc.en: The course can be finished in 16 weeks without cutting materials.
flex_desc.ch: 課程可以於16周內完成。內容沒有刪減。

domain.en: 專業基礎學科 、 大地工程
domain.ch: 專業基礎學科 、 大地工程

en.competency: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public
